alert.note: Alert for Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:58PM MDT until July 20 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OTERO COUNTY... At 557 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Higbee, or 17 miles south of North La Junta, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, torrential rainfall, and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Higbee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
